thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 3 of 67
thread.title: Aad Bosman

author: Aad Bosman
title: Aad Bosman
text:
I had a problem with a template what i not could fix, ive tried the enclosed documentation, google and more.
But then i got to their help service online chat.
They really know their templates, for me it took some explaining to do because english is not my first languange, but after that the problem got fixed really quick.
Helpfull, patience, super friendly and a real source of knowledge
10/10 Super happy customer
